description: Show off your Colorado pride with our Snow Targeted Cushion Colorado Over the Calf Socks. These men's snow socks equip you with their Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability, 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed, performance-oriented fit, and their Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced in-boot comfort. They are designed with a wider welt to help ensure all-day comfort, targeted cushioning around the toe, heel, and shin, and body-mapped mesh zones help keep things breathable. With the extreme comfort, fit, and durability of these snow socks, your best season starts when you put these on.
name: Smartwool Performance Snow Targeted Cushion Colorado Over The Calf Socks - Mens
